verses.verse: <S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and unto his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and unto all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H1697>them<s%>; This is the thing which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H376>Whatever<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> there be of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that <S%H7819>kills<s%> an <S%H7794>ox<s%>, or <S%H3775>lamb<s%>, or <S%H5795>goat<s%>, in the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, or that <S%H7819>kills<s%> it <S%H2351>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%>,

And <S%H935>brings<s%> it not unto the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, to <S%H7126>offer<s%> an <S%H7133>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be <S%H2803>imputed<s%> unto that <S%H376>man<s%>; he has <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>; and that <S%H376>man<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>:

To the end that the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> may <S%H935>bring<s%> their <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>, which they <S%H2076>offer<s%> in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%>, evening that they may <S%H935>bring<s%> them unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, unto the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H2076>offer<s%> them for <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H2077>offerings<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, and <S%H6999>burn<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And they shall no more <S%H2076>offer<s%> their <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> unto <S%H8163>demons<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> whom they have gone a <S%H2181>whoring<s%>. This shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> unto them throughout their <S%H1755>generations<s%>.

And you shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H376>them<s%>, Whatever man there be of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, or of the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> which <S%H1481>stay<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H5927>you<s%>, that offers a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> or <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>,

And <S%H935>brings<s%> it not unto the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, to <S%H6213>offer<s%> it unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; evening that <S%H376>man<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from among his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And whatever <S%H376>man<s%> there be of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, or of the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> that <S%H1481>stay<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H398>you<s%>, that eat any manner of <S%H1818>blood<s%>; I will evening <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and will cut him <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

For the <S%H5315>life<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is in the <S%H1818>blood<s%>: and I have <S%H5414>given<s%> it to you upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for your <S%H5315>souls<s%>: for it is the <S%H1818>blood<s%> that makes an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H5315>soul<s%>.

Therefore I <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, No <S%H5315>soul<s%> of you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>, neither shall any <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>stays<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>.

And whatever <S%H376>man<s%> there be of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, or of the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> that <S%H1481>stay<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H6679>you<s%>, which hunts and <S%H6718>catches<s%> any <S%H2416>animal<s%> or <S%H5775>bird<s%> that may be <S%H398>eaten<s%>; he shall evening <S%H8210>pour<s%> out the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H3680>there<s%>, and cover it with <S%H6083>dust<s%>.

For it is the <S%H5315>life<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>; the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of it is for the <S%H5315>life<s%> there therefore I <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of no manner of <S%H1320>flesh<s%>: for the <S%H5315>life<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is the <S%H1818>blood<s%> there whoever <S%H398>eat<s%> it shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.

And every <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H398>eat<s%> that which <S%H5038>died<s%> of <S%H2966>itself<s%>, or that which was torn with <S%H249>animals<s%>, whether it be one of your own country, or a <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, he shall both <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening<s%>: then shall he be <S%H2891>clean<s%>.
But if he <S%H3526>wash<s%> them <S%H7364>not<s%>, nor bathe his <S%H1320>flesh<s%>; then he shall <S%H5375>carry<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.
